meanings.definition: A female member of a council.
meanings.sent1: The councilwomen discussed the new park plans.
meanings.sent2: There are five councilwomen on the city council.
meanings.sent3: The councilwomen joked about having a council meeting at the ice cream shop.
meanings.sent4: The councilwomen were the shining stars of the town hall meeting.
meanings.sent5: I admire the dedication of the councilwomen in serving their community.

meanings.sent1: She invited the councilwomen to the charity event.
meanings.sent2: The councilwomen attended the budget meeting together.
meanings.sent3: The councilwomen decided to wear matching hats to the council meeting.
meanings.sent4: The councilwomen stood out in their colorful attire.
meanings.sent5: The councilwomen's unity made a strong impact on the council decisions.
